aBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd

ant.aBody:
O rex gloriae domine virtutum qui triumphator hodie super omnes caelos ascendisti ne derelinquas nos orphanos
sed mitte promissum patris in nos sed mitte promissum patris in vos spiritum veritatis alleluia
